Detailed Description

Definition of exceptions in KAAPI.

Function Documentation

void Util::__Exception_throw ( const Exception &  err  ) 

Function call by KAAPI_ASSERT before throwing a Kaapi exception The main goal of this function is to be able to capture and exception during debuging the program. All exception throwed by Kaapi make a call to this function.

See also:
KAAPI_ASSERT
template<class T >
void Util::Exception_throw ( const T &  ex  )  throw (T) [inline]

Function call by macro to throw a Kaapi exception

See also:
KAAPI_ASSERT

Function to throw an exception. The purpose of this method is to be able to set a breakpoint on throw

Parameters:
ex a reference to an Exception object
